trans-unit.target: TEXT_CTSMJICONTACTNPC_00807_OPERATORMAMMET_000_000<tab>Hello there! I have the proud duty of handling communications on the isle─particularly those from Mistress Tataru. I shall inform you the moment I have tidings to share.
TEXT_CTSMJICONTACTNPC_00807_OPERATORMAMMET_000_010<tab>Should I hear word from Mistress Tataru again, you will be the first to know.
TEXT_CTSMJICONTACTNPC_00807_OPERATORMAMMET_000_020<tab>Welcome to the island! I hope you enjoy your stay.
TEXT_CTSMJICONTACTNPC_00807_OPERATORMAMMET_000_030<tab>We have guests! I love it when we have guests!
TEXT_CTSMJICONTACTNPC_00807_OPERATORMAMMET_000_040<tab>Mistress Tataru told me to expect one last group of visitors. I shall notify you the moment she makes contact!
TEXT_CTSMJICONTACTNPC_00807_OPERATORMAMMET_000_050<tab>No contact! No contact from Mistress Tataru! ...I suppose you'll just have to invite your own friends instead!
